update jk_user_bank_card set uid = #{uid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, media_id = #{mediaId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, media_type = #{mediaType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, mer_cust_id = #{merCustId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, bank_card_type = #{bankCardType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, card_id = #{cardId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, identity_type = #{identityType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, identity_code = #{identityCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, card_holder = #{cardHolder,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, bind_no = #{bindNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, usr_pay_agreement_id = #{usrPayAgreementId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, usr_busi_agreement_id = #{usrBusiAgreementId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, gate_id = #{gateId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, bank_name = #{bankName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, bank_branch = #{bankBranch,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, city = #{city,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, province = #{province,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, last_four_cardid = #{lastFourCardid,jdbcType=CHAR}, expire_date = #{expireDate,jdbcType=INTEGER}, status = #{status,jdbcType=TINYINT}, is_default = #{isDefault,jdbcType=TINYINT}, modify_time = #{modifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select:
select
distinct
from jk_user_bank_card
order by ${orderByClause}

SELECT card.id AS bankCardId,CONCAT(LEFT(card.card_holder,1),'**') AS cardHolder,CONCAT(LEFT(card.card_id,4),' ',SUBSTR(card.card_id,5,2),"** **** ",RIGHT(card.card_id,4)) AS cardId,CONCAT("尾号",RIGHT(card.card_id,4)) AS lastFourCardid,bankType.CODE_NAME AS bankName,cardType.CODE_NAME AS bankCardType,bankBanner.CODE_NAME AS bankBanner FROM jk_user_bank_card card LEFT JOIN (SELECT * FROM jk_code `code` WHERE `code`.CODE_KEY='${cardBindBank}') bankType ON card.gate_id=bankType.CODE_NO LEFT JOIN (SELECT * FROM jk_code `code` WHERE `code`.CODE_KEY='${cardType}') cardType ON cardType.CODE_NO=card.bank_card_type LEFT JOIN (SELECT * FROM jk_code `code` WHERE `code`.CODE_KEY='${bankBanner}') bankBanner ON bankBanner.CODE_NO=card.gate_id WHERE card.uid=${uid} and card.status in (2,3)
